text: Vuga uti:- mbega murabona abo mucuditse nabo aribo musenga aho gusenga Imana y’ukuri, rero nimu nyereke n’ahantu hatoyi h’Isi baremye canke boba bafise ishirahamwe mu Majuru canke twarabahaye igitabu no kurico bakaba bagifitiye ko ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, mugabo abahemukiye imitima yabo ntibapfundika amasezerano yabo atari uko arimwo ibinyoma gusa
